english_example_sentence: We send important documents to our new customers every week.
russian_example_sentence: Мы каждую неделю отправляем важные документы нашим новым клиентам.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz her hafta yeni müşterilerimize önemli belgeler göndeririz.
